text: The 1961 Tour of Flanders cycling race took place on March 26, 1961, and was won by Rapha-Gitane-Dunlop's Tom Simpson, becoming the first British winner. It was the 45th edition of the Tour of Flanders "monument" classic race. ==Route== The race started in Ghent and finished in Wetteren for the last time – after 17 years. The total distance was 255 km. There were six categorized climbs: {| width=65% | valign=top align=left width=25% | * Kwaremont * Kruisberg * Edelareberg | valign=top align=left width=25% | * Valkenberg * Kasteelstraat * Grotenberge |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ccccff;" ! !Cyclist !Team !Time |- |1 | |Rapha-Gitane- Dunlop | align=right| 6h 22' 00" |- |2 | |Carpano | align=right| s.t. |- |3 | |Rapha-Gitane-Dunlop | align=right| +11" |- |4 | |Philco | align=right| +34" |- |5 | |Helyett-Fynsec-Hutchinson | align=right| +56" |- |6 | |Peugeot-BP- Dunlop | align=right| +59" |- |7 | |Helyett-Fynsec-Hutchinson | align=right| +1' 00" |- |8 | |Carpano | align=right| s.t. |- |9 | |Torpedo | align=right| s.t. |- |10 | |Peugeot-BP-Dunlop | align=right| s.t. |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Tour of Flanders Tour of Flanders, 1961 Tour of Flanders Category:1961 Super Prestige Pernod
title: 1961 Tour of Flanders
